content.raw:
I just did an apt update & upgrade, and now the simulation doesn’t work properly anymore. IGN starts and shows the tunnel and robots, but there are no topics available, so our program can’t send commands anymore.

I see these errors when I launch it:

ERROR: cannot launch node of type \[ros1\_ign\_bridge/parameter\_bridge\]: ros1\_ign\_bridge  
ROS path \[0\]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros  
ROS path \[1\]=/home/cfotache/subt\_ws/install/share  
ROS path \[2\]=/opt/ros/melodic/share  
ERROR: cannot launch node of type \[ros1\_ign\_image/image\_bridge\]: ros1\_ign\_image  
ROS path \[0\]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros  
ROS path \[1\]=/home/cfotache/subt\_ws/install/share  
ROS path \[2\]=/opt/ros/melodic/share

\(they get repeated several times\).

Running this in a catkin workspace… Did the hg pull and catkin\_make install.
content.html:
I just did an apt update & upgrade, and now the simulation doesn’t work properly anymore. IGN starts and shows the tunnel and robots, but there are no topics available, so our program can’t send commands anymore.

I see these errors when I launch it:

ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_bridge/parameter_bridge]: ros1_ign_bridge
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/cfotache/subt_ws/install/share
ROS path [2]=/opt/ros/melodic/share
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_image/image_bridge]: ros1_ign_image
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/cfotache/subt_ws/install/share
ROS path [2]=/opt/ros/melodic/share

(they get repeated several times).

Running this in a catkin workspace… Did the hg pull and catkin_make install.
